q: Have you ever been abroad? If yes, where did you go?
a:
Yes, I went to Malta a few years ago. It was my first time visiting Malta, so I was very excited. I preferred to go alone because I enjoy discovering new places by myself.

Malta is a beautiful island with amazing sea views and historic places. I spent a lot of time walking around the city and enjoying the weather, which was sunny and warm.
